featured.text: Future plans include static barking sites where deer are commonly seen, but “the noises will not be blared in areas where people live beside the tracks.” 53.
The dot goes by different names in different Hindi dialects, and “bindi” is the one that is most commonly known.
They use a range of terms to describe it—stuck-song syndrome, sticky music, cognitive itch, or most commonly “earworm.”

definition.en_def: In a way that is usual or typical.
definition.example: This type of fruit is commonly found in tropical regions.
